package.name: HTTP
package.description: The HTTP class is a class with static methods for doing miscellaneous HTTP related stuff like date formatting, language negotiation or HTTP redirection.

release.notes: * Fixed Bug #2325 - notice if absoluteUri()'s invoked from CLI * Fixed Bug #2332 - optional unconditional compliance to RFC 2616 for redirect() + Made the $url parameter in absoluteURI() optional, so that the actual URI will be returned if omitted
